channel.title: HELP! How do I make a command require money to use?
channel.description: Hi, I want to make a ::hybrid etc command but i want to make it require a certain amount of money to use it, so its an Eco/spawn server, but im a beginner coder and dont know how I would do that. If anyone can help it would be greatly appreciated. Thank you!

item.title: HELP! How do I make a command require money to use?
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

blo0d pker:

What I showed him won’t even work fully. He still has to have it delete the money and do what he wants to do. All I did was show him how make the command recognize the player has the money.

Ehh. True. I take it back. Sorry, I am in a trolling mood right now.

Read full topic
item.source: HELP! How do I make a command require money to use?

item.title: HELP! How do I make a command require money to use?
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

Wow. Let’s spoon feed him some more boiss? Make a if else statement to see if the player has the money. If he does, take the money away from him, if he doesn’t send a message to him. Look for shops to compare, then edit it yourself.

“Mopareacape is not a ‘Spoon-feeding’ community.”

We will help you LEARN. Just give us the chance to, and be open minded.

Read full topic
item.source: HELP! How do I make a command require money to use?

blo0d pker:

c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, AMOUNT)

item.description:
@tigman9 wrote:

Im using the teamtorva v3 client and source, (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=495620.0) and it uses erasedpkz cache. It doesnot have them already, i know how to make a new command, just not make it require money to use
